creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: ten lines on white paper with silver and gold flecks; lines alternate between four and two characters; red relief stamp URC; square relief stamp LLC; mounted on cobalt blue
markings: URC, rectangular relief stamp; LLC rectangular relief stamp; various markings on R side on back of fan; on back of mount, URQ, in red marker: [Ichikama Tokuan / {Japanese name} / (Beian\'s grandson)]
title: Poem
